message.content:
cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper deals with the avoidability of patterns in words, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). It also involves the study of aperiodic words, which is related to formal languages (cs.FL). The use of variables and reversals in the patterns suggests a connection to information theory (cs.IT). The paper may also involve numerical analysis (cs.NA) in the analysis of the patterns. Finally, the paper may be relevant to computational complexity (cs.CC) in terms of the algorithms used to identify and avoid these patterns.
